name: Sloth Runners
description:
Infinite runner where you play as a sloth in 20 times faster time Don't fall to the ground, or you will get run over.

NOTE, SOUND SEEMS BROKEN IN WEB BUILD, YOU CAN MUTE THE SOUND ON THE MAIN MENU.

Credits: I made this game with a friend Smelly Lemonade, he did all the art I did the coding.

tools used:

Art: Aseprite

Engine: unity

SFX: SFXR
